name: World Congress on Infectious Diseases
content: Magnus Group takes the pleasure to invite you to participate in the “World Congress on Infectious Diseases” (WCID 2020) during November 19-21, 2020 at Rome, Italy. The World Congress on Infectious Diseases is a three-day international conference specially designed with a cluster of scientific sessions, providing a common platform for the researchers, academicians, industry delegates across the globe to share and exchange their knowledge and contribution. WCID 2020 facilitates a better understanding of the recent developments and scientific advancements across the world by showcasing the pace of science and technology. This event will bring together leading experts from across the world who will review progress in a broad range of areas from infectious diseases, Microbiology, Immunology and Epidemiology filed. Recommended Infectious Diseases Conference, infectious diseases conferences 2020, Microbiology Conferences, Clinical Microbiology Conferences 2020, Infection Congress
